TopicTitle: [1.1.2] KSPRC - Renaissance Compilation: artworks remake [V-0.7 Pre Release 3]

Articles.Content:
If it were me and I were concerned with the looks but not the launches, I'd remove SmokeScreen. I believe the Smoke at launch can be a cause of some major lag on occasion. Also, ATM shouldn't have any affect on framerates, it just reduces the memory footprint KSP uses when loading.

The new smokescreen allows you to edit the max particles and stuff like that.
Thanks, that did the trick for me. Although deleting Smokescreen altogether turned out to be a bad idea, since most engine animations use it, disabling parts of it definitely helps

Hey guys I was just wondering if anyone was experiencing any particle problems from the NASA srb's http://imgur.com/f8361dk

It only looks like that at this angle. Also this only happens when I install KSPRC but when I just use Hotrockets and smoke screen alone its just fine.

I've sent this as a message to both you, Proot, and Mihara, so hopefully I can figure out what the issue is.

I've done a clean install of both KSPRC and RPM, and I think it's something screwing up between them. Screens display this wonky grey broken texture, and the AG buttons are messed up as well.

Any ideas?

Output log: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/74775048/output%20logs/output_log.txt

Hey to those experiencing particle problems for their boosters, I found out that the problem is coming from the FX folder from with in the TextureReplacer folder. The directory should be GameData/TextureReplacer/Default/Squad. You should find two folders in the Squad folder. One FX and the other parts. In order to get rid of the problem I just deleted the FX folder. I don't know how deleting the folder will affect the game but so far I haven't run into any more problems. Just make sure you backup your game if your gonna try this fix.
My kerbals keeps getting duplicated when they EVA and get back into the ship. Used a fresh install and only Renaissance+Dependancies.

Oh you guys had flags? I had the KSP logo

http://i.imgur.com/DBZTjDe.png

I bet your flag was the flag with the KSP logo. It's whatever mission flag you have set to the craft. I have it with all the NASA engines and SRBs.
Any ideas, anyone?
it's an issue with Active Texture Management. I hear the Green Skulls ATM configs clears it up. Do some searching around, I've seen people post about this problem all over the place multiple times

Anybody tried this? You can disable ATM

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82118-KSP-64bits-on-Windows-%28this-time-it-s-not-a-request%29
Is it possible that this mod be used in a lite version? The only thing I would like to use are the planet enhancements, the other stuff is peripheral.

I have installed all the mods that are required but whenever I install this I get a huge FPS drop when at LKO. It goes down to like 5 FPS. The more I go out into space from Kerbin, the better performance I get which is around 30 FPS. Without this I get the normal 30 FPS.
